item.title: Estimating the Internal Structure of the 2019-2021 DSA NPC
item.description: The Democratic Socialists’ of America 2019 National Convention was excellent and there has been a surfeit of great articles) about it. But despite all the writing about the convention, I had a thought which I have not seen addressed: what do the delegates’ ballots tell us about the internal structure of the new NPC? In particular, will the structure expressed in the ballots correspond to the candidates’ factional endorsements? Social Networks I decided to tackle it with social network analysis.
